Thanks,

-Jiri-

Subject: Re: [junit] hello test example - errors


Your class doesn't appear to be in a package starting with the name "junit".
Please check the package name of your test class.

>So said Medlen, Jiri on 2003-05-22 --------------------
>Hello,
>
